strings.string: API Key from aqicn.org. Click on (i) to get API Key from http://aqicn.org
Use GPS. If checked, then built-in GPS will be used, otherwise the city below will be used

Air quality is considered
satisfactory, and air
pollution poses little or
no risk

Air quality is acceptable;
however, for some pollutants
there may be a moderate
health concern for a very
small number of people
who are unusually sensitive
to air pollution

Members of sensitive
groups may experience
health effects. The general
public is not likely to be
affected

Everyone may begin
to experience health effects;
members of sensitive groups
may experience more
serious health effects

emergency conditions.
The entire population is
more likely to be affected
